alert.note: Alert for Perry (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 22 at 1:29AM CST until January 23 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Tennessee... Buffalo River Near Lobelville affecting Perry County. For the Buffalo River...including Lobelville...elevated river levels are forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 730 PM CST. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Buffalo River Near Lobelville. * WHEN...From early this morning to tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Gilmer Bridge Rd and Russell Creek Rd begin to flood. Leeper Bottom and Qualls Bend Rd become flooded as well. Water approaches portions of Highway 438 south of Lobelville near Beardstown. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 AM CST Saturday the stage was 13.8 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 7.0 feet Wednesday evening. - Action stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
